TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE:
SELECT DISTINCT ADT.runID RUN_ID, SYS_BLD_FUNC_NME ,
SYS_FUNC_PROC_NME, SYS_NME, SYS_BLD_AREA_NME, &xD; BTCH_CNTL_NME , BTCH_CNTL SEQ,
CURR_BSNS_DTE --CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS RUN_AUDT_STRT_DTM FROM $$Param_META_DB_ID.V_SYS_MAPG_DTL_META,
S$Param_META_DB_ID.T_META_BATCH_CTRL, (SELECT COALESCE(Max(RUN_AUDT_ID),0)+1 AS runID from $$Param_META_DB_ID.T_META_RUN_AUDIT
WHERE SYS_BLD_FUNC_NME='$$Param_BLD_FUNC_NME'AND SYS_FUNC_PROC_NME-'$$Param_PRCS_NME')ADT WHERE SYS_BLD_FUNC_NIME-'$$Param_BLDFUNCNME'AND SYS_FUNC_PROC_NME='$$Param_PRCS_NME' AND BTCH_CNTL_NME= '$$Param_SOR_NME'

ATTRIBUTE.NAME: Maximum Memory Allowed For Auto Memory Attributes
Maximum Percentage of Total Memory Allowed For Auto Memory Attributes
Additional Concurrent Pipelines for Lookup Cache Creation
Session Log File Max Time Period
